history.proof: intros z Hz. destruct Hz as [k Hz]. rewrite Hz. apply Zeven_ex_iff. exists k. reflexivity.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall z : Z, (exists k : Z, z = Z.mul 2 k) -> Zeven z

Premises:
N.mul = fun n m : N => match n with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos p => match m with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos q => N.pos (p * q) end end : N -> N -> N Arguments N.mul (_ _)%N_scope
Inductive Z : Set := Z0 : Z | Zpos : positive -> Z | Zneg : positive -> Z Arguments Zpos _%positive_scope Arguments Zneg _%positive_scope
Zeven = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => True | _ => False end : Z -> Prop Arguments Zeven _%Z_scope
Zeven_def1 : forall z : Z, Zeven z -> exists k : Z, z = 2 * k
sqr_0 : forall z : Z, z * z = 0 -> z = 0
Zeven_equiv : forall z : Z, Zeven z < -> Z.Even z
Zmult_eq_reg_l : forall z z1 z2 : Z, z * z1 = z * z2 -> z <> 0 -> z1 = z2
Zeven_ex_iff : forall n : Z, Zeven n < -> (exists m : Z, n = 2 * m)
OMEGA5 : forall x y z : Z, x = 0 -> y = 0 -> x + y * z = 0
QArith_base.Qle_lt_trans : forall x y z : QArith_base.Q, QArith_base.Qle x y -> QArith_base.Qlt y z -> QArith_base.Qlt x z
QArith_base.Qlt_trans : forall x y z : QArith_base.Q, QArith_base.Qlt x y -> QArith_base.Qlt y z -> QArith_base.Qlt x z
OMEGA6 : forall x y z : Z, 0 <= x -> y = 0 -> 0 <= x + y * z
fast_OMEGA16 : forall (v c l k : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (v * (c * k) + l * k) -> P ((v * c + l) * k)
QArith_base.Qmult_le_l : forall x y z : QArith_base.Q, QArith_base.Qlt {| QArith_base.Qnum := 0; QArith_base.Qden := 1 |} z -> QArith_base.Qle (QArith_base.Qmult z x) (QArith_base.Qmult z y) < -> QArith_base.Qle x y
QArith_base.Qmult_lt_l : forall x y z : QArith_base.Q, QArith_base.Qlt {| QArith_base.Qnum := 0; QArith_base.Qden := 1 |} z -> QArith_base.Qlt (QArith_base.Qmult z x) (QArith_base.Qmult z y) < -> QArith_base.Qlt x y
Z.divide = fun x y : Z => exists z : Z, y = z * x : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments Z.divide (_ _)%Z_scope
QArith_base.Qplus_lt_r : forall x y z : QArith_base.Q, QArith_base.Qlt (QArith_base.Qplus z x) (QArith_base.Qplus z y) < -> QArith_base.Qlt x y
OMEGA17 : forall x y z : Z, Zne x 0 -> y = 0 -> Zne (x + y * z) 0
OMEGA20 : forall x y z : Z, Zne x 0 -> y = 0 -> Zne (x + y * z) 0
OMEGA3 : forall x y k : Z, k > 0 -> x = y * k -> x = 0 -> y = 0
Zeven_div2 : forall n : Z, Zeven n -> n = 2 * Z.div2 n
Zeven_quot2 : forall n : Z, Zeven n -> n = 2 * Z.quot2 n
BinIntDef.Z.even = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => true | _ => false end : Z -> bool Arguments BinIntDef.Z.even _%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.sgn = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos _ => 1 | Z.neg _ => -1 end : Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.sgn _%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.odd = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => false | _ => true end : Z -> bool Arguments BinIntDef.Z.odd _%Z_scope
Zodd = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => False | _ => True end : Z -> Prop Arguments Zodd _%Z_scope
Zeven_ex : forall n : Z, Zeven n -> exists m : Z, n = 2 * m
IZR = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 => R0 | Z.pos n => IPR n | Z.neg n => (- IPR n)%R end : Z -> R Arguments IZR _%Z_scope : simpl never

```coq
intros z Hz.
destruct Hz as [k Hz].
rewrite Hz.
apply Zeven_ex_iff.
exists k.
reflexivity.
Qed.```
